Who are the competitors of TechTron?

Top competitor s of TechTron include BCPG Public Company, Sermsang and Annex Power.

TechTron ranks 4 th among 9 active competitors. 2 of its competitors have exited. Overall, TechTron and its competitors have raised over $30M in funding across 1 funding rounds involving 1 investors. There are 2 public companies in the entire competition set.
